prompts: Create a psychic-type Pokemon with a soothing green color and a unique flower-like head.
I want a small humanoid Pokemon that embodies tranquility and has a gentle expression.
Generate a Pokemon that evolves from a tiny creature into a powerful psychic being, adorned in soft colors.
Make a cute, fairy-like Pokemon featuring green and pink accents, perfect for forest habitats.
Imagine a Pokemon with a delicate appearance, capable of using mind-based abilities in battle.
Design a Pokemon with a serene personality, resembling a magical sprite found in grassy areas.
Show me a Pokemon that looks friendly and approachable, with a design that inspires calmness.
